entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dolbeau-Mistassini
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:27 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 26 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
